name: part_005
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY2】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment HoneyWorks stage DAY2【チラ見せ】 [XuQm_HL2ntg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: A compilation of fan messages and illustrations for 'hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment'.
Attention notices for visitors in Japanese and English.
Sales period information with significant visual and audio distortion/glitch.

subtitles.original:
Attention ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
声出し応援 OK です

Attention: To all visitors
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Vocal cheering is OK.
